I bought it a long time ago but has decided to give it a try just recently. I've watched some youtube vids before playing the game so I won't be a potato. Well, I still am.
It will be irritating at first, missing skill checks/not knowing which perks are useless/wtf do the symbols in your screen mean. Trust me, you'll get a hang of it. You'll get better. And you'll have better teammates and soon encounter better killers.
GIVE IT A TRY. IT IS WORTH IT.

EDIT: I can't believe I can love and hate a game so much.

Game is fun, and very fun when playing with friends. It comes at a very fair price for how many hours you could get out of it, especially on sale, and although bug fixes and quality of life updates can take a while to come out sometimes, I think it's definitely worth buying.

Los desarrolladores promocionan el campeo y el genrush en sus torneos, este modo de juego esta hace mas de 4 a√±os y no piensan cambiarlo. En este juego el killer tiene que hacer 12 cuelgues, para matar a 4 personas y los supervivientes solo tienen que hacer 5 motores contra un killer. El juego esta lleno de bugs y problemas de optimizacion, pero en vez de arreglar estos problemas los desarrolladores solo se enfocan en sacar nuevos trajes y personajes :/
